abstract.t: This document, iCalendar Message-Based Interoperability Protocol (iMIP), specifies a binding from the iCalendar Transport-independent Interoperability Protocol (iTIP) to Internet email-based transports. Calendaring entries defined by the iCalendar Object Model (iCAL) are composed using constructs from RFC 2822, RFC 2045, RFC 2046, RFC 2047 and RFC 2049. This document is a product of Calendaring and Scheduling Standards Simplification (calsify) working group. More information about the IETF CALSIFY working group activities can be found on the IETF web site at <http://www.ietf.org/html.charters/calsify-charter.html>. The issue tracker for the Calsify WG is located at: <http://www.ofcourseimright.com/cgi-bin/roundup/calsify>
